data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 2,746,558 who are far from you in Araria, Bihar, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Araria, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Araria, Bihar, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 2,811,600 people living in Araria.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Araria, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Amat people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, encourage the 30,928 believers in Araria to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Araria.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Araria, Bihar, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Araria
location.people_groups_list: Bhalla, Bedia (Muslim traditions), Bhakat, Atishbaz, Laheri (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bhalla (3,600), Bedia (Muslim traditions) (4,100), Bhakat (2,900), Atishbaz (3,400), Laheri (Muslim traditions) (56,000)
